how.title: How Darsoon works
how.description: Wherever you are in the world, you can easily learn whatever you like with a private tutor at a reasonable cost. Here are the steps:
how.one: Choose the class and tutor of your choice and complete the free introductory meeting application form.
how.two: The tutor will contact you to arrange a free introductory meeting.
how.three: If you wish to continue, make the necessary payment to book a single session or packages of 5, 12 or 20 on the tutor's personal page.
how.four: Coordinate subsequent sessions directly with your tutor.
